pages.text: Advent of Ascension(AoA) adds a number of player skills which reward the player with benefits and bonuses the higher the player's level in these skills.$(br2)For a complete description of each skill and the rewards they give, press $(thing)$(k:aoa3.adventGui)$() and view the Guides section.

pages.title: Skills
pages.text: You can also check the level of your skills on screen by pressing $(thing)$(k:aoa3.skills)$(). $(br2)It is because of these skills that many QOL, like right-click harvest, were not included. Grinding these skills is a chore and many will level up naturally by playing the game with vanilla mechanics, making it more possible to craft the powerful items associated with the skills.
